Articles.Content:
So, can i battle someone now?

sure, just give a persist file
Not my point. the point was i haven't been on in 2 months and i was hoping someone to say oh not Corgi

okay then...

oh not Corgi again...

So, can i battle someone now?

I will battle you Corgi. Due to your request, Oh Not Corgi!
stupid dog, smacks him on the nose with a newspaper, happy now?

I was wondering if you guys could help me test the new Mk2 Murderer, Initial tests have proved promising but additional data is always appreciated.

Volley of 2 and then volleys of 4 after that:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I've lowered the part count to about 365ish and moved all the pods further from the seed part to make targeting harder. More fuel has been added and 2 girder rockets have been removed.

Persist: https://www./?p7gpwvbad3d9nzf
hello all hows it goin.

Hello! it's been pretty dead recently. panfish, Spearka and Corgi (have you got a fleet yet?) were all talking about a match a couple of days ago but haven't agreed to anything yet.

This thread is in need of a scrap or two atm, are you (or anyone else for that matter?) up for a 5v5?
Im game for one.
I would battle, but my computer is raging war against my KSP and i cant get it to work. Not even reinstalling it works....
Ok zekes, how does 500 tons (+/- 10%) and tylo sound?
how many ships max? And Tylo... MMgh I have a D/V disadvantage
5 ships max and how about Laythe instead, same gravity but only 1/3 of the SOE radius?
Ok sounds good, no leaving SOI? and do you want to set up first or me.
You can setup, seeing as I've had less fights
Alright will do.

Alright- ready. The largest group of Drekevaks ever has been assembled. Hellfire Club, Cameroon, Valkyrie, Burgandy Blue, and Cornwall are in line formation, about 5km spacing. They are the brand-new "Sweet Sixteen" Drekevak XVIs.

http://www./view/qe37az9jdjc6yl0/persistent(55).sfs
What's new?
Me and tegu are gonna battle. 5v5
I meant about the Drek.

Remember how the Drek's main part was that little pod in the back? It was easy to destroy. I replaced it with a Girder beam, which means it will be much harder to kill, and added a third Nuclear engine.

Ok, I took the first shot, Hellfire Club is dead:

Happy I'd finished the job I then stole your missiles (rest of turn in the album too)

Javascript is disabled. View full album

persist:https://www./?ubidugh93eh833c
Tegu- I'm really swamped this week, I'll try to take my turn when i can but i am really short on time.
no worries, not like there's a sell by date.

Alrighty, I've been invited to this peaceful little club (Very[\I] peaceful) and I have an Itch i've been waiting to scratch since I found out the KSP multiplayer method. So who is up for a 1v1 match with a noob in LKO?
